Navigation

The main view consists of two tabs, tasks and lists. By pressing the menu button you can bring up a menu to navigate to special functionality.

Tasks

From the task view you can quickly create tasks by entering a name in the bottom field and pressing ´´´´´´´´´´´Add´´´´´´´´´´´´´´´.

Pressing ´New...´ will take you to the advanced task adding view where you have more options, such as priority.

Longpressing a task gives you options to delete, edit and complete a task. While in the task tab you can also, by pressing the menu button and selecting sort, choose to sort tasks.

Lists

In list view you can add task lists with the bottom edit bar. Press a list to go into it and make it active. Longpress a list to be able to edit it and delete it (which will delete all related tasks)
